name: TheSecretGame2 (itch)
description:
Story

You think you are in a forest but are you? Are that really noises from someone crying? Many questions you need to answer to save not only yourself from this dark place...  
We created this game in remembrance to Steam Greenlight.
TheSecretGame2 is entirely based off of our communities suggestions and development to ensure that you guys get the best experience possible, from haunted to calm settings and the real question is when will it end?

Basically a very bad game which was on Steam for five months before it was removed... image why...
